title: Applied Learning Conference (ALC) - STLA - SIT

meta.description: SIT holds the ALC every two years for local and international experts to exchange ideas and discuss issues and challenges around applied learning.

text_lines: A biennial conference organised by SIT to propel conversations and collaborations on Applied Learning.

is the brainchild of SIT and reflects the university’s ongoing efforts to highlight the value and importance of applied learning. Through this conference, SIT aims to bring together international and local experts to contribute to the evolving discourse of applied learning on various fronts.

The fifth Applied Learning Conference (ALC 2025) will be held on 2 and 3 July 2025 at SIT Punggol Campus. Themed "Navigating the Future: Competency-based Education for a Skills-Ready Workforce," ALC 2025 seeks to bring together thought leaders and practitioners from across the globe to:
Explore how Competency-Based Education (CBE) bridges education and industry needs to prepare future-ready learners;
Highlight SIT's commitment to advancing CBE in alignment with Singapore’s SkillsFuture movement;
Gain practical insights into adopting CBE across academia and industry;
Examine the intersections of CBE and educational technology innovation; and
Connect with thought leaders to shape education for evolving industry demands.
Strategist, Advisor and Author, The Expertise Economy
Assistant Secretary-General, Director (Strategy) & Covering Director (Legal Services), NTUC
Chair, Expert Group on Future Skills Needs, Ireland
Provost & Executive Vice-Chancellor and Chief Learning Officer, The University of Kansas
CEO, Asia-Pacific & Board Chairman, Generation: You Employed, Inc.
Group Chief Executive Officer, SMRT Corporation Ltd
Pro-Vice-Chancellor, The Chinese University of Hong Kong
HE Consultant & Researcher and Emeritus Professor at University of Gloucestershire
Distinguished Guest Speaker, ALC 2020 and ALC 2023

article_texts:
Applied Learning Conference
A biennial conference organised by SIT to propel conversations and collaborations on Applied Learning.
The
Applied Learning Conference (ALC)
is the brainchild of SIT and reflects the university’s ongoing efforts to highlight the value and importance of applied learning. Through this conference, SIT aims to bring together international and local experts to contribute to the evolving discourse of applied learning on various fronts.
The fifth Applied Learning Conference (ALC 2025) will be held on 2 and 3 July 2025 at SIT Punggol Campus. Themed "Navigating the Future: Competency-based Education for a Skills-Ready Workforce," ALC 2025 seeks to bring together thought leaders and practitioners from across the globe to:
Explore how Competency-Based Education (CBE) bridges education and industry needs to prepare future-ready learners;
Highlight SIT's commitment to advancing CBE in alignment with Singapore’s SkillsFuture movement;
Gain practical insights into adopting CBE across academia and industry;
Examine the intersections of CBE and educational technology innovation; and
Connect with thought leaders to shape education for evolving industry demands.
